alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 16 at 3:50AM HST until January 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .The large, long- period north- northwest swell (340-350 degree) swell is coming in larger than predicted, thus have upgraded the advisory to a warning. This swell will peak today and trend down tonight. Another large, long period swell northwest swell (310 degree) will fill in tonight keeping surf elevated for north facing shores and bringing surf up for west facing shores. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 20 to 25 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
